Introduction to &kpp;
This part explains what essentially &kpp; is and what advantages it provides. It gives an overview of the functionality of &kpp;, which is demonstrated with example. Detailed discussion of concepts is left to the reference part later in this book.
&kpp-intro;
Reference Manual
This part lists all concepts of &kpp; and explains them in detail. It is meant as a complete documentation of all features and contains advices of do's and don'ts. To the advanced user it should serve as a programming reference.
